title: ID2D1RenderTarget::CreateRadialGradientBrush(const D2D1_RADIAL_GRADIENT_BRUSH_PROPERTIES &,const D2D1_BRUSH_PROPERTIES &,ID2D1GradientStopCollection,ID2D1RadialGradientBrush) (d2d1.h)
